mean_cn: n. 麻醉剂，麻药；  adj. 麻醉的，感觉缺失的
mean_en: a drug that makes a person or an animal unable to feel anything, especially pain, either in the whole body or in a part of the body
sentence: The doctor is injecting anesthetic into the cat before the operation.
sentence_trans: 医生正为猫注射术前麻醉剂。
word_etyma: an不 ＋ esthet知觉 ＋ ic表名词 → anesthetic麻醉剂
